question: Analyze the social media engagement of companies in the technology industry over the last year.
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Identify all companies in the technology industry and their active status.","table":["CompanyInfo"]},{"step":2,"task":"Extract social media engagement metrics (likes, comments, engagement rates) from Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube for the identified companies over the past year.","table":["CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]},{"step":3,"task":"Summarize the extracted metrics and analyze trends across different social media platforms to identify which platforms have the highest engagement for technology companies.","table":["CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]}]
